title: Bug 120315 - Display property 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
OB: While using the new pdf emitter, if the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is expected that the item should disappear from the preview.
EB: However, when previewing the pdf, the label is still visible even though the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the document. 
2. Open the 'properties' view. 
3. In the 'sectionDisplay' property, set it to 'none' to hide the label. 
4. Preview the document in the pdf emitter and observe that the label is still visible.
